description.long: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%, reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and increases the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%, reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and increases the hold duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Hold.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
Provides a small chance to cause minor lethal damage to your targets.  This effect will trigger roughly 3.5 times per minute.
